pairs.interpretation: Almost all refund requests result in cancellation - natural workflow
Email transfers often happen with ER product
ER has higher-than-average refund rate
India tag always co-occurs with PPP - perfect association
Brazil tag always co-occurs with PPP - perfect association
Argentina tag always co-occurs with PPP - perfect association
Colombia tag always co-occurs with PPP - perfect association

Video download issues almost always bugs

problem_bundles.name: Download/Video Bugs
problem_bundles.recommendation: Create comprehensive troubleshooting FAQ for download issues - nearly all support requests are bugs that may have known workarounds

problem_bundles.name: PPP + Bug Correlation
problem_bundles.recommendation: Investigate PPP detection/application bugs - users from PPP countries hitting more technical issues. FAQ should address geo-detection troubleshooting

problem_bundles.name: PPP + Refunds
problem_bundles.recommendation: PPP customers have elevated refund rate - ensure PPP terms are clear upfront; FAQ should address upgrade paths from PPP purchases

problem_bundles.name: Magic Link Issues
problem_bundles.recommendation: Magic link delivery is a recurring pain point. FAQ needs comprehensive magic link troubleshooting (spam folders, email providers, alternative login)

problem_bundles.name: Testing JavaScript + Refunds
problem_bundles.recommendation: Testing JavaScript course has higher-than-average issues and refunds - investigate course content/quality; FAQ should address common testing setup problems

problem_bundles.name: Video Player Bugs
problem_bundles.recommendation: Video playback issues almost always bugs - FAQ should include browser compatibility, buffering fixes, and known player issues

problem_bundles.name: Certificate + Bug Reports
problem_bundles.recommendation: Certificate generation has technical issues - FAQ should explain how completion is tracked and common certificate problems

insights.country_ppp_perfect_association: Country tags (india, brazil, argentina, colombia) have lift ~46x with PPP - they are redundant signals. Consider consolidating tagging.
insights.refund_workflow_expected: refund request â†’ refunded and canceled (lift 25.8x) is expected workflow, not a problem.
insights.testing_javascript_quality_concern: Testing JavaScript course appears multiple times with elevated refund rates and bug reports - potential content/UX issue
insights.download_features_broken: Download-related features (video download, download materials) have extremely high bug correlation - these features need stability work
insights.magic_link_reliability: Magic link issues correlate with both bugs and specific courses - authentication system reliability concern
